Posts.Content: On Nov 15, 2007 12:00 AM Mater wrote: I am a bit confused.  I have breast cancer and took Premarin for 15 years.  I am negative receptors.  Did I understand correctly that if my receptors are negative, I am unable to file a lawsuit against the Mfg. of Premarin????? I took Premarin for 4 years and was just diagnost in April 2014 with Breast Cancer. I am ER negtaive. I am also confused why does it have to be ER pos. to file a lawsuit.
Posts.Title: Premarin Law Suit
